target_markets.market_description: Solo founders and solopreneurs who need to wear multiple hats
pain_points: lack of specialized skills in areas like sales, bizdev, financials
target_markets.market_size_indicators: mentions of 200+ different needs/wants from personal founder experience

problems_validated.problem: Solo founders struggle with tasks outside their expertise while needing to handle all business functions
problems_validated.severity: high - described as wearing 'all the different hats' and triggering 'I wish that was' thoughts
problems_validated.current_solutions: agencies for taxes, marketing, design; ChatGPT/Claude for piecemeal tasks
problems_validated.market_gap: current AI solutions are clumsy, require manual prompting, lack business context and continuity

products_tools.name: ChatGPT
products_tools.use_case: bouncing ideas, generating content variations, writing emails with specific tones

products_tools.name: Claude (Anthropic)
products_tools.use_case: constant conversation about business decisions and task execution

products_tools.name: Apollo
products_tools.use_case: sourcing sales outreach emails, getting industry and business data

business_strategies.strategy: Focus on building businesses around AI agents rather than creating better AI
business_strategies.implementation: leverage existing AI tools to solve real business problems

business_strategies.strategy: SaaS business offering specialized AI co-founders for different business functions
business_strategies.implementation: people sign up, train AIs on their codebase, documents, knowledge base, notion documents

problems_solutions.problem: Solo founders need specialized expertise in marketing, sales, CTO functions but can't afford full-time hires
problems_solutions.solution: AI co-founder system that provides specialized virtual team members
steps: train AI on business documents and codebase
configure AI for specific roles (marketing, CTO, sales)
interact with AI as virtual co-founder

startup_ideas.idea: AI Co-founder platform - virtual 24/7 co-founder with zero equity that handles marketing, sales, CTO functions
startup_ideas.problem_solved: eliminates need to wear multiple hats, provides specialized expertise without hiring costs
startup_ideas.business_model: SaaS with multiple AI specialists (marketing AI, CTO AI, sales AI)
startup_ideas.validation: strong founder pain point, existing clumsy solutions indicate demand

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Building better AI instead of building businesses around existing AI agents
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: focus on connecting existing AI tools to solve real business problems
mistakes_to_avoid.example: most founders are building in the wrong direction

growth_tactics.tactic: AI-powered personalized outreach using web scraping for prospect research
steps: build internal representation of target person
scrape web for additional prospect data

trends_signals.trend: AI agents replacing teams of people
trends_signals.opportunity: building businesses around AI agents rather than improving AI itself

trends_signals.trend: Solo founders using AI for business tasks
trends_signals.opportunity: most people doing this clumsily, room for better solutions

actionable_quotes.quote: the real opportunity isn't creating better AI it's building businesses around AI agents
actionable_quotes.context: discussing startup opportunities in AI space
actionable_quotes.actionability: focus on application layer rather than infrastructure

actionable_quotes.quote: the tools are already here the market wants it but no one's connecting the dots
actionable_quotes.context: explaining why AI agent businesses are opportunities
actionable_quotes.actionability: look for connection opportunities between existing tools and market needs

actionable_quotes.quote: I want a co-founder with zero Equity
actionable_quotes.actionability: position AI solutions as equity-free team members

key_statistics.statistic: 200 different things that I need and want but never get to make
key_statistics.context: personal backlog of business needs from founder experience
